name: Emperor’s Hyena
description: A medium-sized undead creature resembling a hyena with a malevolent presence. Its natural armor provides solid defense, and it has a ghostly appearance filled with dark vapor.
memorable: Its ability to inflict exhaustion with its breath and poison with its stench makes it a fearsome adversary.
goals: To create chaos in battle by attacking in packs and debilitating foes.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead creatures or beasts.
environment: Typically encountered in desolate wastelands or battlefields where undead roam.
strengths: Brisk movement speed allows effective positioning in combat, and advantages from Pack Tactics enhance its attacking potential.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and capable of being turned by clerics despite its advantage against turning effects.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with deadly bite attacks that deal piercing and necrotic damage, alongside a breath attack that causes necrotic damage and exhaustion.
most_powerful_ability: Black Breath can significantly alter the flow of battle by inflicting damage and exhausting opponents.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in low-light conditions, contributing to its effectiveness in ambushes.
skills: Proficient in perception, aiding in the detection of hidden threats.
additional_information: Damage immunities include poison, enhancing its durability.
Has advantage on saving throws against effects meant to turn undead.
Resistant to cold and necrotic damage, making it hardier against specific types of attacks.
Thrives in chaotic environments, often requiring tactical maneuvers in combat.
Its stench ability can significantly hinder opponents' effectiveness in battle.
test_queries: creature with black breath and strong bite
aggressive hyena that fights in packs
